26g PROTEIN
Mousse

DOUBLE CHOCOLATE PROTEIN MOUSSE

An intensely rich and chocolatey mousse with 26g of protein. A chocolate lover's dream come true.

26g
Protein
250
Calories
10m
Total Time
2
Yield

Nutrition per 1 serving

Carbs18g
Fat10g
Fiber5g
Sugar6g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 60g chocolate whey protein powder
  • 240g silken tofu, drained
  • 30g unsweetened cocoa powder
  • 60ml unsweetened almond milk
  • 5g stevia or other sweetener to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Blend Ingredients

In a blender, combine the protein powder, silken tofu, cocoa powder, almond milk, and sweetener.

2

Blend Until Smooth

Blend on high until the mixture is completely smooth and creamy.

3

Chill

Pour the mousse into individual serving dishes and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to set.

4

Serve

Serve chilled, garnished with chocolate shavings or fresh berries.

5

Storage

Store any leftover mousse in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
